title: Embroidery Hood, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal thread, linen
Technique: applique on velvet and satin weaves, lined with heavy linen
description: Green velvet with applique showing the Virgin and Child (?) surrounded by scrolling vine and leaves. Lined with heavy linen.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidery Hood, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk, metal thread, linen
Technique: applique on velvet and satin weaves, lined with heavy linen. Gift of Leverton Harris. 1913-13-4.
